Package ohos.aafwk.ability.continuation

Class ExtraParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.continuation.ExtraParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class ExtraParams
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Defines the extra parameters used to sort out the list of available devices.

    You can pass an ExtraParams object when calling methods for device filtering to the methods used for interacting with the Device+ control center.

    Since:
    5

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ohos.utils.Sequenceable

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtraParams

        public ExtraParams​()
        A constructor used to create an empty ExtraParams instance.
        Since:
        5

      • ExtraParams

        public ExtraParams​(String[] devType,
                   String targetBundleName,
                   String description,
                   String jsonParams)
        A constructor used to create an ExtraParams instance based on the input parameters devType, targetBundleName, and description.
        Parameters:
        devType - Indicates the type of devices to be matched. This parameter can be any combination of DEVICETYPE_SMART_PHONE, DEVICETYPE_SMART_PAD, DEVICETYPE_SMART_WATCH, and DEVICETYPE_SMART_TV.
        targetBundleName - Indicates the bundle name of the target application where the ability will be migrated.
        description - Indicates the description used for device filtering.
        jsonParams - Indicates the custom JSON parameters to be used as filter conditions.
        Since:
        5
